context:
path /v3/egld/transaction/count/address
opid egldgettransactioncount
params
in path
name address
required True
schema
type str
maxlength 62
minlength 62
sum get count of outgoing egld transactions
desc 1 credit per api call
get a number of outgoing egld transactions for the address when a transaction is sent there can be multiple outgoing transactions
which are not yet processed by the blockchain to distinguish between them there is a counter called a nonce which represents
the order of the transaction in the list of outgoing transactions
responses
200
type num
